item.description:
Hi All, 

The "Mayor of Running", Bart Yasso, and the Runners World editors are doing a Marathon Saturday warm-up event which looks like fun.

It's out of the Newbury Street PUMA store on Saturday April 16th - an easy, 2-to-3 mile jog (or whatever distance you'd like!), followed by refreshments and giveaways.

It starts at 8am and should be a lot of fun... Anyone else fancy coming?

~ Martin

www.cheekyrunning.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Runners World Shakeout Run, Presented by PUMA
